page.title: 17MY DAY- OUT OF SCHOOL
page.content: Dad wakes me up running his bath."Oh no", Ithink,"It's Thursday-{school}is the dreaded word.Seven o'clock already and my sister is reading.I pick up my book but fall asleep again." Come on, Sarah " my Mum calls . I get up and get dressed but everyone else has finished their breakfast. I do the washing up and at 8.15 my sister goes off to catch the bus to her school.I have to walk to mine and leave 30 minutes later. Hurrah! It's 3.10,we go home.At 3.30 my brother and I go to the Hillier's farm for{Riding}, often playing with their puppies when we get back.Next-tea! At 6.30 I get changed to go into Malmesbury to do land drill that's running and circuit training in connection with The{Marlin's Swimming {Club}. By 8.30 it's home to bed.
